entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 12. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023
